ai-tha-ap333:1.2_0: like a fairy flying through the sky.
ai-tha-ap333:2.1_0: My goblins grief for a month,
ai-tha-ap333:3.4_0: at the fore of the mendicant Saṅgha,
ai-tha-ap333:4.2_0: one should not raise joined palms to him.
ai-tha-ap333:4.3_0: I paid homage at the teacher’s feet,
ai-tha-ap333:5.2_0: and the fragrance of the fairies.
ai-tha-ap333:5.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap333:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap333:6.2_0: and skeleton without flesh or blood,
ai-tha-ap333:6.3_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap333:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Mandhāra.
ai-tha-ap333:8.1_0: with a fairy fracture, and the senior mendicants first.
